> * save 20% when buying 8 patterns this pattern is available in english only and uses standard us crochet terminology ***description*** this hygge table-top crochet christmas tree will instantly add a touch of festive elegance to your desk the swirly textured lines are so easy to create it will take you less than an hour to make one christmas tree and the best part is they look like you really put in an effort which is why these will also make for the perfect handmade gift this holiday season you can use any yarn and make it any size and as a bonus you ll also learn a new technique that you ll love the pattern is worked from the top down so you can easily adjust its size as you go ***finished measurements*** height 7 inches or 18 cm base diameter 4 inches or 10 cm ***difficulty*** beginner ***materials*** yarn worsted weight yarn in 2 contrasting colors you can use any yarn weight just adjust the hook size accordingly so that you end up with a dense fabric with no holes hook 5 0 mm hook or appropriate hook size notions scissors darning needle 1 locking stitch marker ***yardage*** main color tree base 40 yds or 36 m contrast color snow detail 20 yds or 18 m yardages are approximate and may vary based on your gauge yarn and hook size ***how do i download my pattern *** after completing the payment check your inbox for an email containing a download link button for the pdf pattern you will need a pdf reader installed to open the pattern ***socials*** instagram @crochethighway facebook crochethighway ravelry crochet highway designs ***pattern support*** for pattern related questions please join my facebook support group crochethighway designs or contact me at thecrochethighway at gmail com https //www facebook com/groups/crochethighway ***copyright disclaimer***
